media:group.media:title: Accepting a Disabled Child, Part 1
media:group.media:description:
Most dads don't think about the responsibility of caring for a disabled child until they experience it first hand.  Loving and accepting a child with special needs is a process which takes time and prayer to go through the emotions.

Sign up to our FREE weekly Today's Father Newsletter:  http://www.fathers.com/newsletters/

Visit http://www.fathers.com for ideas, advice and inspiration for being the best dad you can be to your children.
